page.title: 20A Future for Horsted Keynes
page.content: What do we want for the future? We have tried to find out how the people in the village would like to see Horsted Keynes change in the years to come. The youngest schoolchildren want to see better playing facilities such as improvements to the recreation ground, more slides and swings and a zoo. Older children see a need for a greater variety of shops and clubs. They would like a swimming pool and an adventure playground. Some find the village "not very exciting"; others like it as it is and do not want it to grow, change and become "spoilt". Adults too have mixed feelings about the village's future. Most do not want it to grow much more. They would like improved facilities such as the bus service, a mains gas supply and a wider range of shops and clubs.
